## About Default Folder

Default Folder revolutionizes file management by enhancing standard open and save dialogs with intelligent features that dramatically improve workflow efficiency. This utility application integrates seamlessly with your system's file dialogs, adding powerful navigation tools, folder favorites, and recent file tracking that eliminate the repetitive clicking through folder hierarchies. By providing instant access to commonly used directories and sophisticated file filtering options, Default Folder transforms the mundane task of file navigation into a streamlined, productive experience that saves valuable time and reduces frustration during daily computer use.

The application excels in its unobtrusive yet powerful approach to file dialog enhancement, maintaining the familiar interface while adding carefully designed productivity features. Default Folder's intelligent folder suggestions learn from your work patterns, automatically presenting relevant locations based on current projects and recent activity. Its comprehensive set of tools includes path navigation, file tagging, preview capabilities, and batch operationsâ€”all accessible directly within standard file dialogs. This thoughtful integration ensures that users can maintain their existing workflow habits while benefiting from significant time savings and improved file management efficiency across all their daily tasks.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

### Platform Compatibility
- **Supported Systems**: Modern desktop operating systems
- **Processor**: Multi-core processor for responsive performance
- **Memory**: 2GB RAM minimum, 4GB recommended
- **Storage**: 100MB available space for application and preferences
- **Integration**: Compatible with all applications using system file dialogs

### Feature Support
- **File Types**: All document, image, and media formats
- **Folder Management**: Favorites, recent folders, path navigation
- **Search Capabilities**: File name, content, and metadata searching
- **Customization**: Theme options and workflow preferences
